SEARCH
Package Core.Entities

Class Model

java.lang.Object
Core.Entities.Model
public class Model extends Object
The Model class represents a 3D model with an ID, vertex count, and associated material.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Model(int id, int vertexCount)
    Constructs a new Model with the specified ID and vertex count.
    Model(int id, int vertexCount, Material material)
    Constructs a new Model with the specified ID, vertex count, and material.
    Model(Model model, Texture texture)
    Constructs a new Model by copying an existing model and assigning a new texture.

      vertexCount - The number of vertices in the model.

      Constructs a new Model with the specified ID, vertex count, and material.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for the model.
      vertexCount - The number of vertices in the model.
      material - The material associated with the model.

      Constructs a new Model by copying an existing model and assigning a new texture.
      Parameters:

      texture - The texture to set for the new model.
